org.cpsolver.instructor.model

Class Instructor.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.instructor.model.Instructor.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssignmentConstraintContext<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>, AssignmentContext
    Enclosing class:
    Instructor

    public class Instructor.Context
extends Object
implements AssignmentConstraintContext<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>
    Instructor Constraint Context. It keeps the list of current assignments of an instructor.
